scenes.background: You decide to check in with Monica about the task. Monica looks stressed and says:
scenes.description: I cant believe you dumped this task on me while youre on leave!

options.text: I apologize, Monica. Let's figure out a way to handle this together.
options.analysis: You acknowledged her stress and offered to collaborate, demonstrating strong perception and empathy.

options.text: I didn't mean to overwhelm you. Can I help you prioritize?
options.analysis: You offered help while maintaining your boundaries, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but empathy could be stronger.

options.text: If it's too much, maybe Bob can assist.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical solution, showing motivation and social skills, but empathy and perception were lower.
